Title: Mock Two Piece Evening Dress with Illusion Bodice

----

Sku: CK42

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 8, 14, 4, 6, 12, 10

----

Colors: black

----

Category: evening, formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: CK42-black-mock-two-piece-evening-dress-with-illusion-bodice_p.jpg

----

Description: A mock two piece with a sheer midriff is accented with beading and sequins. The halter top has sheer fabric across the bust and on the back. A sleek cutout on the back compliments the mock two piece design. There is bead work at the waistline creating a belted look. The skirt of the gown flows to the floor and trains.
